name: SFOX
headline: Crypto-currency trading platform.
description: SFOX, a YC-backed company, makes it easy for enterprises to trade bitcoin.  We started with an advanced trading platform that uses algorithms to provide a competitive advantage to our customers. SFOX now aims to expand international commerce by making it easy to trade any currency and settle in real time.

![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Group.png)
# Scale your crypto advantage
sFOX is the full-service crypto prime dealer for institutional investors, providing the liquidity, security, and infrastructure needed to unlock the full potential of digital assets.
[ Get Started ](http://sfox.com/<https:/trade.sfox.com/signup>)
Create an account at no cost, or [schedule a product walkthrough](http://sfox.com/<https:/www.sfox.com/product-demo/>) with an expert. 
[ ![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/sFOX_google_play@2x.png) ](http://sfox.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sfox.android#038;hl=en_US&gl=US>)
[ ![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/sFOX_ios@2x.png) ](http://sfox.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/sfox/id1583801613>)
FEATURED IN 
##  In crypto, opportunity is everywhere 
## With sFOX, it’s all in one place.
sFOX aggregates crypto liquidity for unparalleled access to trading opportunities on a global scale.From a single account.
![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/DIAGRAM@2x.png)
## Limitless liquidity. Unprecedented performance.
sFOX’s unique depth of market unlocks price improvements, reduced slippage, and operational advantages, enabling trades at speed and scale—without impacting the market.
30+ Liquidity providers
80+ Markets
10x Deeper orderbook liquidity
[ Learn More ](http://sfox.com/<https:/www.sfox.com/liquidity/>)
![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/orderbook@2x.png)
Smart Routing N/AMaker/Taker
Standard smart-routed market-to-limit order.
IOC SpeedIOC
An Immediate-Or-Cancel (IOC) order is an order to buy or sell a currency that will be executed immediately. Any portion of an IOC order that cannot be filled immediately and at a price, better than or equal to the order limit price, will be cancelled.
TWAP N/ATWAP
An order that is designed to execute evenly over a set amount of time at a price equal to—or better than—the order price.
Stop N/AStop/Market
Triggers a market buy or sell order as soon as the average exchange price reaches your specified price.
Trailing Stop Risk MgmtStop/Market
An order that automatically adjusts the stop price at a fixed percent or quote currency amount below the current market price.
Hare PricePost-only
Constantly updates price by pegging to best bid/ask that results in best price. Jumps between exchanges to get a better price.
Sniper SpeedHidden-taker only
More aggresive smart order that continuosly refires order executing deeper into the order book to optimize for speed.
Polar Bear SpeedHidden-taker only
Trades against only the top of the order book with a randomized delay offering potential price improvement and minimized market impact.
Gorilla Price +Very large ordersPost-only
Trades against only the top of the order book with a randomized delay offering potential price improvement and minimized market impact.
## Unbiased access to the best prices in crypto
sFOX takes a fully agnostic position as a trading partner, offering over 15 algorithms and order types to automate best price execution across 80+ markets—without taking proprietary risk. 
[ Get Started ](http://sfox.com/<https:/trade.sfox.com/signup>)
[ Learn More ](http://sfox.com/<https:/www.sfox.com/order-types/>)
## Capital efficiency meets scalability​.
sFOX goes beyond standard prime dealer services to offer the unique capital and operational efficiencies needed to operate at scale. Experience full trade lifecycle support from one account—no additional accounts or service providers required.
###  Custody 
###  Clearing 
###  Robust reporting 
###  Flexible settlement 
###  Best price execution 
![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/clientservices@2x-1.png)
CLIENT SERVICES 
## Accomplish more with agile client support.
Our dedicated in-house experts move as fast as you do, responding to your queries in hours—not weeks.
[ Get Started ](http://sfox.com/<https:/trade.sfox.com/signup>)
## Engineered to exceed security standards.
Our fully secure, compliant, and regulated platform was built in-house to provide ironclad protection from outside threats.
###  Zero security incidents in company history 
###  No hot wallets or outside ledgers 
###  Deposits housed in encrypted cold storage 
###  Industry-leading encryption standards 
###  Patented custody technology 
###  $200MM of insurance of physical destruction of cryptocurrency private keys* 
99.99% uptime
SOC 2 certification
24/7 support
FinCEN registered
*Provided by various syndicates at Lloyd’s of London, led by Arch Syndicate 2012. Certificate of insurance available upon request. 
## Slow and steady wins nothing
Accelerate your advantage with access to more opportunities in the digital asset class.
[ Sign Up ](http://sfox.com/<https:/trade.sfox.com/signup>)

![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Group.png)
# Scale your crypto advantage
sFOX is the full-service crypto prime dealer for institutional investors, providing the liquidity, security, and infrastructure needed to unlock the full potential of digital assets.
 Get Started ⟨23⟩
Create an account at no cost, or schedule a product walkthrough⟨24⟩ with an expert. 
 ![⟨25⟩ ](http://sfox.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sfox.android#038;hl=en_US&gl=US>)
 ![⟨26⟩ ](http://sfox.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/sfox/id1583801613>)
FEATURED IN 
##  In crypto, opportunity is everywhere 
## With sFOX, it’s all in one place.
sFOX aggregates crypto liquidity for unparalleled access to trading opportunities on a global scale.From a single account.
![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/DIAGRAM@2x.png)
## Limitless liquidity. Unprecedented performance.
sFOX’s unique depth of market unlocks price improvements, reduced slippage, and operational advantages, enabling trades at speed and scale—without impacting the market.
30+ Liquidity providers
80+ Markets
10x Deeper orderbook liquidity
 Learn More ⟨5⟩
![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/orderbook@2x.png)
Smart Routing N/AMaker/Taker
Standard smart-routed market-to-limit order.
IOC SpeedIOC
An Immediate-Or-Cancel (IOC) order is an order to buy or sell a currency that will be executed immediately. Any portion of an IOC order that cannot be filled immediately and at a price, better than or equal to the order limit price, will be cancelled.
TWAP N/ATWAP
An order that is designed to execute evenly over a set amount of time at a price equal to—or better than—the order price.
Stop N/AStop/Market
Triggers a market buy or sell order as soon as the average exchange price reaches your specified price.
Trailing Stop Risk MgmtStop/Market
An order that automatically adjusts the stop price at a fixed percent or quote currency amount below the current market price.
Hare PricePost-only
Constantly updates price by pegging to best bid/ask that results in best price. Jumps between exchanges to get a better price.
Sniper SpeedHidden-taker only
More aggresive smart order that continuosly refires order executing deeper into the order book to optimize for speed.
Polar Bear SpeedHidden-taker only
Trades against only the top of the order book with a randomized delay offering potential price improvement and minimized market impact.
Gorilla Price +Very large ordersPost-only
Trades against only the top of the order book with a randomized delay offering potential price improvement and minimized market impact.
## Unbiased access to the best prices in crypto
sFOX takes a fully agnostic position as a trading partner, offering over 15 algorithms and order types to automate best price execution across 80+ markets—without taking proprietary risk. 
 Get Started ⟨23⟩
 Learn More ⟨27⟩
## Capital efficiency meets scalability​.
sFOX goes beyond standard prime dealer services to offer the unique capital and operational efficiencies needed to operate at scale. Experience full trade lifecycle support from one account—no additional accounts or service providers required.
###  Custody 
###  Clearing 
###  Robust reporting 
###  Flexible settlement 
###  Best price execution 
![](https://www.sfox.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/clientservices@2x-1.png)
CLIENT SERVICES 
## Accomplish more with agile client support.
Our dedicated in-house experts move as fast as you do, responding to your queries in hours—not weeks.
 Get Started ⟨23⟩
## Engineered to exceed security standards.
Our fully secure, compliant, and regulated platform was built in-house to provide ironclad protection from outside threats.
###  Zero security incidents in company history 
###  No hot wallets or outside ledgers 
###  Deposits housed in encrypted cold storage 
###  Industry-leading encryption standards 
###  Patented custody technology 
###  $200MM of insurance of physical destruction of cryptocurrency private keys* 
99.99% uptime
SOC 2 certification
24/7 support
FinCEN registered
*Provided by various syndicates at Lloyd’s of London, led by Arch Syndicate 2012. Certificate of insurance available upon request. 
## Slow and steady wins nothing
Accelerate your advantage with access to more opportunities in the digital asset class.
 Sign Up ⟨23⟩
 Talk to an Expert ⟨24⟩

generated_description:
### Overview of SFOX

Founded in 2014, SFOX is a cryptocurrency trading platform that emerged from the prestigious Y Combinator's Summer 2014 batch. Based in Los Angeles, California, the company has grown to a dedicated team of 40 employees, all focused on transforming how enterprises engage in cryptocurrency trading.

### Mission

SFOX's mission is simple yet ambitious: they aim to facilitate and simplify cryptocurrency trading for enterprises and institutional investors across the globe. Initially designed for trading Bitcoin, their platform has evolved to support multiple currencies, boasting the capacity for real-time trading and settlement. 

### Key Offerings

At its core, SFOX operates as a full-service crypto prime dealer catering specifically to institutional clients. They offer a sophisticated trading platform that leverages advanced algorithms to provide competitive advantages in trading. Key offerings include:

- **Trading Solutions**: Advanced trading capabilities tailored for diverse institutional needs.
- **Liquidity**: Access to a wide array of liquidity providers, ensuring superior trade execution.
- **SAFE Custody**: Secure management of client assets with robust testing for security compliance.
- **Staking**: Opportunities for clients to earn rewards on their crypto assets.
- **Post-trade Settlement**: A streamlined approach for settling trades effectively.
- **API Integration**: Allowing clients to seamlessly integrate SFOX’s services into their existing platforms.

### Unique Selling Proposition

SFOX prides itself on its capability to aggregate liquidity. This means clients gain access to numerous markets and liquidity providers from a single account. With advanced order types and smart routing technologies, SFOX ensures trades are executed at optimal prices with minimal market impact.

### Security and Compliance

Safety and reliability are paramount in the crypto space, and SFOX stands out with its robust security protocols:
- Zero security incidents in company history.
- Deposits are securely stored using encrypted cold wallets.
- Insured protections against physical destruction of cryptocurrency keys, amounting to $200 million.
